content: this beautiful renly cowl has a lovely fan stitch pattern that s cozy but still slightly open this project is made with knit picks brava tweed yarn in the wasabi colorway and is one of the march contributions to the 2024 scarf of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** approximately 246 yds of category 4 medium weight yarn i used knit picks brava tweed yarn in the wasabi colorway size j 6mm furls streamline metal crochet hook yarn needle for weaving ends scissors
